subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the clothes dryer.
(2) Open the clothes dryer.
(3) Take the plastic bag out of the clothes dryer.
(4) Fold the plastic bag.
code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Open the clothes dryer
    clothes_dryer = registry(env, "clothes_dryer_zlmnfg_0")
    open(robot, clothes_dryer)
    donothing(env)
